Transcription for 547509

And let the wind bound all the years seven years.
But with it, God's power will bring.
Send your conqueror far in death.
With it, God's power will bring.
For our years in the present known.
Power, glory, love and love.
Roll and come, all ye though gone way.
Power, glory, love and love.
Christian power, love and power.
With it, God's power will bring.
Send your conqueror far in death.
With it, God's power will bring.
For our years in the present known.
